import { useSWRMutationPmc } from '@/hooks/swr/useSWRMutationPmc';
import { $PARAM_TYPES, $RESPONSE_TYPES } from '@/types/$MODULE_NAME/$FILE_NAME';
$API_IMPORT
import { ResponseData } from '@/utils/apiService/types';
import { SWRMutationConfiguration } from 'swr/mutation';

export const $HOOK_NAME = (
  option?: SWRMutationConfiguration<ResponseData<$RESPONSE_TYPES>, any>
) =>
  useSWRMutationPmc(
    '$HOOK_NAME',
    async (_: any, { arg }: { arg: $PARAM_TYPES }) => await $FUNCTION_NAME({ payload: arg }),
    option
  );
